title: bhakthi minshaaram
sahitya:
bhakti minshAram aruLvAi paramAtmanE bhakti minshAram aruLvAi



anupallavi



shaktiyai AdhAra cakkarattil eTri sahasrAra siddhiyAl satcitAnandam perum



caraNam 1



citta shuddhiyuDanE dhyAnattir-kUTTi tIyezhum Atma vivEkattai nATTi

eddishaiyilum unnai ezhil pera kATTi eppOdum ennuLLun inbattai UTTIppara



caraNam 2



mukguNa vinaiyiruL muTrilum vilagiDa mUla kuNDalik-kanal

mUNDennuL ilakiDap-

pakkuvak-kani pOl en pAmalar pazhuttiDap-pArelAm cinmayam

pArtuLan-shilirttidA
